TopicTitle: How to get this thing into orbit?

Articles.Content:
So, I'm trying to make a space station but I can't get this thing into a solid circular orbit and dock with something, any ideas? What happens is at around 15000 or so it spins out of control... http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/903249917221270547/03FA6CADFE1DD3B22126186F9D7FFB46FF9C99A8/

Edited June 2, 2013 by irichey25

Well first off, here you are carrying rocket fuel tanks to power your jets, which is highly inefficient as the oxidizer just stands there as a dead weight. And for the spinning out, it is probably due to overgimballing engines. Did you turn off the gimbal on the jet engines?
I just tried turning off the gimbals before launch, I just spun again.
Does MechJeb flip it off or are you launching it manually?

I tried both, with Mech Jeb and with out mech jeb. Still at 17000 it

flips out.
It sounds like a gimbal inverting problem... but I don't see where it comes from. Can you provide the craft file?
So I figured out what was wrong, the air intake ran out and then it caused me to spin out.
Also, make sure your center of gravity stays ahead of your center of thrust
